name: BangaloreNewsinKannada
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: News in Kannada for Bangalore and the surrounding regions from All India Radio. This requires no configuration. This is the first News Service in Kannada from Bangalore for Indians on Intelligent (AI enabled) Speaker platform.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
